page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content:
Carr Bridge Field This children's playing field is situated off Barnsley Road,in Ackworth It is called Carr Bridge.In the adventure play-ground there are swings,including baby swings,a roundabout,a see-saw and a slide which is built on a slope.Also in the play- ground are some constructions of wood which have poles so children can slide down them.This is not finished but it is supposed to be finished sometime in August 1985.Also in this park there are a couple of goal posts,but when the football season has finished the posts are taken down.Also near the park is a newly built school called Mill Dam,it is for young children from the age of five to nine years of age.
ADRIAN HARDMAN Aged 13
